frontmatter.title: You Won't Get Rich Renting Out Your Time -- My Thoughts
frontmatter.description: Holidng a regular 9-5 job is essentially renting out your time. Someone offers you some money to show up at a certain place and you do it. When you rent out your time, you limit your output based on your input. You will never generate true wealth until your outputs can non-linearly scale from your inputs. Creating new products or businesses is the only way to generate non-linear outputs.
